text.p: Scores in four-day Sheffield Shield cricket matches on Friday:
In Sydney (second day): New South Wales 126 and 183-4 (Rodney Davison 79 not out), Western Australia 244 (Brad Hogg 59; Brad McNamara 5-75).
In Melbourne (second day): Victoria 174-6 (Graeme Vimpani 62), Tasmania 359-7 declared (Daniel Marsh 97, David Boon 75, Mark Atkinson 50 not out, Shaun Young 50).
In Adelaide (first day): South Australia 323-5 (Darren Lehmann 165 not out, Jamie Siddons 61, Martin Faull 50) v Queensland.
